messages.speech: •  Check Yes to 'Has the subject experienced any significant past and/or current diseases?' if there is any significant prior conditions or illnesses (reported as diagnosis), including conditions for which the subject is or has been followed by a physician or conditions that could resume during the course of the study or lead to an SAE or to a repetitive outpatient care.

•  Do not report past common isolated infections without sequelae (e.g rhinitis, bronchitis, common cold etc...). If a chronic allergy is entered, indicate in the verbatim if it was symptomatic or not at inclusion.
•  The worsening of pre-existing condition is an AE and should be reported in the Unsolicited Systemic Events page of the CRF.

•  Any medications the subject is still taking and which correspond to the reportable categories as a result of the ongoing Medical History should be recorded on the Reportable Medication page of the CRF:
